predicate.note: Frames file for 'change' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'develop' and 'replace' and 'turn'

roleset.name: transform

example.name: agentive
example.text: The commercial changed the dynamics of the campaign.

example.name: ergative
example.text: ...customers whose addresses have changed during the past 3 1/2 years.

example.name: passive
example.text: ...the areas that can be most easily changed *trace*

example.name: with end state
example.text: ...erasures changed wrong answers to right ones on a statewide test.

roleset.note: "Start state" and "thing changing" are usually the same, but there can be cases where they are separate. Reserve use of Arg3 for these cases.

example.name: explicit start state
example.text: Customers change from borrowers to savers/investors.
